backend/main.mo: Defines numerous types for rooms, styles, products, orders, users, and project workflows, forming the backend data model. Includes a utility module and authorization imports but is truncated before logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx into the #root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, shared layout, protected routes, and React Query client.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile, handling form state and saveProfile mutations.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Button component that adds a product to the cart with quantity validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: Form for submitting consultation requests, validating identity and date before sending a mutation and showing toast messages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that renders a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/navigation/BackB: Back button that navigates browser history or falls back to a specified route.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer displaying branding, social links, navigation links, and ordered locations.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Sticky header with navigation links, category dropdown, cart count, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/packages/Package: Sections explaining the design process and listing features included in all packages.
frontend/src/components/packages/room-pa: Card component showing product image, details, price, and stock status for included package items.
Renders sortable list of included products with a select control and product cards.
Displays skeleton placeholders for product list while loading.
Shows package header with details, inventory-based quantity selector, and add-to-cart handling.
Lists room packages and highlights the selected one for navigation.
Displays a room package summary card with style, room type, price, and selection state.
Shows skeleton loaders for room package cards during fetch.
frontend/src/components/packages/StylePa: UI for selecting style and room type, viewing matching room packages, and adding package products to the cart.
frontend/src/components/products/GlobalP: Provides debounced global product search with loading, error, and result states.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product card with image, price, stock badge, quantity selector, and add-to-cart button.
frontend/src/components/products/Quantit: Simple increment/decrement quantity control with bounds checking.
frontend/src/components/products/SafeExt: Image component that swaps to a fallback image on load error.
frontend/src/components/vendors/VendorLi: Vendor card showing name, verification status, GST, contact, and registration date.
frontend/src/components/vendors/VendorRe: React component managing vendor registration with field validation, OTP flow, and API mutations.
frontend/src/data/furnitureImageOverride: Provides copyright‑free image URLs for furniture subcategories and utilities to override missing product images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the currently authenticated user's profile via the actor with loading state tied to identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations like fetching packages, projects, notes, and vendor OTP workflows.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/cart/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with quantity controls, item removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/checkout/CheckoutPage: Handles checkout flow including buyer info, delivery address, payment selection, validation, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Shows user design projects with loading and error states, allowing project viewing or starting a new one if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Shows a detailed view of a selected designer, handling loading/error states and displaying bio, styles, and portfolio.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Lists designers with search and style filters, rendering cards for each and loading indicators when fetching data.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a list of FAQ items using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero, features, and navigation actions based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the service process through a series of steps with descriptive text and icons.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and link back to home.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Interactive multi-step onboarding quiz collecting room type, style preferences, budget, and timeline with navigation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Displays a review of collected onboarding data and submits a project brief, handling authentication, validation, and submission states.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Displays design packages with loading and error states, showing package cards with features and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/products/DecorLanding: Simple landing page for decor products with a header and a coming-soon message.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnishingLa: Landing page for furnishing products featuring a themed header and coming-soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnitureMen: Shows a grid of furniture subcategories linking to detailed product listings.
frontend/src/pages/products/FurnitureSub: Fetches and displays products for a specific furniture subcategory with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductBrand: Displays products for a selected brand with full loading, error, and not-found handling.
Lists all product brands with loading and error states, linking to brand detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Displays three product categories with images and links for furniture, furnishing, and decor.
Fetches and shows products for a selected category with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/products/RoomCategory: Shows room-based style package listings with a back button and intro text.
frontend/src/pages/products/ShopLandingP: Landing page offering global product search and links to room packages, categories, and brands.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Loads project details and notes, allows adding notes, and shows project status and information.
frontend/src/pages/RoomVisualizerPage.ts: Provides a manual room visualizer where users upload a room photo, select products, and adjust placement and scale.
frontend/src/pages/vendors/VendorsPage.t: Manages vendor registration, displays vendors, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: Gatekeeper component that prompts users to sign in with Internet Identity before accessing protected content.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, bulk-add, remove, quantity update, and subtotal functions.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store managing onboarding fields like room type, styles, budget, timeline, and selected package with setters and reset.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides INR currency formatting and timestamp-to-date or datetime formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/locations.ts: Generates a location list ensuring Ahmedabad appears first without duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/roomPackageSort.ts: Defines sort options and a function to sort products by name or price in ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature states, and pending vendor registration feature requests.
